songs.title: Shanti/Ashtangi
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Vunde gurunam caranaravinde
Sandarsita-svatma-sukhavabodhe
Nihsreyase jangalikayamane
Sansara-halahala
Moha-santyai
Hala hala

Abahu-purusakaram
Sankah-cakrasi
Ahahu-purusakaram
Sankah-cakrasi
Dharinam d ha rinam
Sahasra-hasra-sirasam
Dharinam d ha rinam
Sahasra-hasra-sirasam
Vande

[Chorus]
Om shanti
Om shanti
Shanti, shanti
Shante om

Om shanti
Om shanti
Shanti, shanti
Shante om

[Verse]
Vunde gurunam caranaravinde
Sandarsita-svatma-sukhavabodhe
Nihsreyase jangalikayamane
Sansara-halahala
Moha-santyai
Hala hala

Abahu-purusakaram
Sankah-cakrasi
Ahahu-purusakaram
Sankah-cakrasi
Dharinam d ha rinam
Sahasra-hasra-sirasam
Dharinam d ha rinam
Sahasra-hasra-sirasam
Vande

[Chorus]
Om shanti
Om shanti
Shanti, shanti
Shante om

Om shanti
Om shanti
Shanti, shanti
Shante om

Om shanti
Om shanti
Shanti, shanti
Shante om
